A comparison of the numbers shown under 1. and IV. for the 8 months does not.therefore, give.an accurate criterion.of the vessels in Allied service at the different periods. ,l Requisition " is here used to mean " requisition for full Government service." ip In "Requisitioned vessels" and "Vessels repairing (from Services in I.)
